attributes.action: Stop MPs having their heating and other energy bills paid for by the taxpayer.
attributes.additional_details: This HAS to be the most appallling and grossest of ALL immoralities to be going on while hundreds of thousands of households are paying tax rates which means they have to decide the eat or heat while some 650 of the vilest and most corrupt parasites merely pass their energy bills over to those same people for payment.  It serves to demonstrate, YET AGAIN, that our elected dishonourables are certainly NOT IN IT WITH US!  This just might be the straw which broke the camels back - WHERE CAN WE JOIN UP FOR THE DEMOCRACY ARMY AND PICK UP OUR BOMBS AND BULLETS?
